Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to detect the presence of water in the vicinity of the information system and alerts [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].Supplemental Guidance:  Automated mechanisms can include, for example, water detection sensors, alarms, and notification systems.
